import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Stethoscope, User, Calendar, LogOut, Search } from "lucide-react"; const Dashboard = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("appointments"); const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const renderAppointmentsSection = () => (

Mis Citas Médicas

{[ { specialty: "Cardiología", doctor: "Dr. Carlos Mendoza", date: "15 Dic 2024", time: "10:30 AM", status: "Confirmada", }, { specialty: "Dermatología", doctor: "Dra. Ana Ruiz", date: "22 Dic 2024", time: "14:00 PM", status: "Pendiente", }, ].map((appointment, index) => (
{appointment.specialty} {appointment.status}

Dr(a). {appointment.doctor}

{appointment.date} {appointment.time}
))}
); const renderModal = () => ( isModalOpen && (
Agendar Nueva Cita
) ); return (
{/* Sidebar */}

MediCenter

{[ { icon: Calendar, label: "Mis Citas", value: "appointments" }, { icon: Search, label: "Buscar Citas", value: "search" }, { icon: User, label: "Perfil", value: "profile" }, ].map((item) => ( ))}
{/* Main Content */}
{activeTab === "appointments" && renderAppointmentsSection()}
{renderModal()}
); }; export default Dashboard;
